member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE16
member.summary: The EMRPOLYPOLYLINE16 and EMRPOLYPOLYGON16 structures contain members for the and enhanced metafile records.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE16.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE16.rclBounds
member.summary: The bounding rectangle, in device units.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE16.cpts
member.summary: The total number of points in all polys.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE16.aPolyCounts
member.summary: An array of point counts for each poly.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE16.apts
member.summary: An array of structures, representing the points in logical units.
